attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to obtain compensation for all Child Migrants that were trafficked by the UK Government some as young as three, to British colonies namely Australia, to a life of abuse and brutality, their childhoods stolen. 
The Prime Minister Gordon Brown stated in his apology on the 24th. February 2010 “that all child migrants would be looked after as long as they were alive”.
Compensation would allow the aging Child Migrants who are still alive to get some closure on this horrific part of British history they all endured.
